name: Shopping Spree
description:
As you stand there just dreading every moment it’ll take, you look down at your grocery list wishing you didn’t have to do this.  As you enter the store you are bombarded by the sounds of competition. You have just stepped onto the set up “SHOPPING SPREE!” You and up to 3 other players are set against each other in Kart versus Kart action as you attempt to grab your groceries in the most exciting grocery trip you’ve ever taken. 

Features

  • Fast paced competitive Kart action
  • Local 4 player split screen
  • Arena kart combat
  • Multiple locations
  • 6 play modes
  • Level Objectives and Difficulty Customization

FOLLOW US @
